Class AlbumController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Photos.controller.ControllerBase
      • Photos.controller.AlbumController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener<javafx.scene.control.Tab>, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent>, IController

    public class AlbumController
extends ControllerBase
implements javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent>, javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener<javafx.scene.control.Tab>, IController
    This class represents all the functionality an album can have.
    Author:
    William Chen, Chijun Sha
